title: What Is a Bitcoin ETF, and Why Does Everyone from Blackrock to Fidelity Want One?
description: A Bitcoin ETF creates a simple, legally compliant way to trade the price of Bitcoin, accessible on markets that investors are already familiar with.

title: Coinbase moves to dismiss SEC charges, describes it as an ‘extraordinary abuse of process’
description:
Crypto exchange Coinbase has filed a motion to dismiss the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) lawsuit against it, describing it as an “extraordinary abuse of process,” according to a June 28 filing. SEC’s “about-face” Coinbase argued in its filing that the SEC’s lawsuit stems from a shift in the regulator’s approach to the cryptocurrency […]

The post Coinbase moves to dismiss SEC charges, describes it as an ‘extraordinary abuse of process’ appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ledger wallet leaps forward with institutional-grade crypto trading platform
description: Paris-based Ledger, renowned for its cryptocurrency hardware wallets, unveiled a cutting-edge trading platform for institutional investors. The Ledger Enterprise Tradelink network has already garnered significant interest from prominent cryptocurrency exchanges and brokers such as Bitstamp, Huobi, Crypto.com, Uphold, CEX.IO, Wintermute, Coinsquare, NDAX, Damex, Bitazza, Flowdesk, and YouHodler. This revolutionary system addresses the pressing challenges of ... Read more

title: Largest ETF manager in Hong Kong analyzes crypto possibilities
description: One of the largest asset management companies in Hong Kong, Hang Seng Investment Management Co., is reviewing the possibility of tapping into the decentralized ecosystem. On June 26, one of the largest banks in Hong Kong, HSBC, unveiled bitcoin (BTC)…

title: Canada proposes measures to support blockchain and crypto
description: Canadian lawmakers have shown their support for blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies in a report released by the Parliamentary Standing Committee on Industry and Technology (INDU) of the Canadian House of Commons. The report, consisting of 16 separate proposals, highlights the…

title: European Central Bank to Pass Digital Euro Bill: Will it Drive BTC Price to $20,000 or $40,000 and Beyond? Report
description: The European Commission has proposed two bills to support the use of cash and a framework for a digital euro. Digital euro payments will complement the physical euro and will be transacted online and offline. The European Commission has a legislative plan to launch a digital euro payment system fueled by the widespread acceptance of [...]

title: Building Bridges for Blockchain Regulation: IOTA Foundation and FTI Consulting Release Report on Industry Dialogue
description: IOTA organizes a series of policy discussions on blockchain regulations with industry players and policymakers. There was a discussion of the future of NFT regulations, self-hosted wallets, regulatory clarity, global harmonization, etc.  There have been several discussions surrounding the regulation of the blockchain and the crypto industry. Interestingly, the fast-evolving ecosystem poses several challenges to [...]

title: Render Token (RNDR) Update: RNDR Left Behind as Pikamoon (PIKA) Becomes the Go-To GameFi Token
